'''Flamegranates''' are an [[Exploration]] mechanic in [[Natlan]]. They will explode a brief moment after being hit by {{Pyro}} attacks, dealing {{Color|True Pyro DMG}} within a small [[Area of Effect|AoE]]. They can also be grabbed by an [[Saurian Indwelling|indwelled]] [[Yumkasaurus]] or by [[Kinich]], who can then shoot it in a certain direction, dealing more {{Color|True Pyro DMG}} within a bigger AoE on hit.

Flamegranates generate 2 [[Phlogiston]] Particles upon exploding, partially refilling the player's Phlogiston meter (as long as they are within range).
